title: Circle of the Land
content: n otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally.10 TurnsTarget must be a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend. 18m WIS SaveConcentration Conjure Elemental Lv 5 Conjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Bend the barrier between the Planes until they disgorge an elemental ally to follow and fight for you.18m Insect Plague Lv 5 Conjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 4d
